Plot: An incumbent Representative embroiled in personal scandal faces a no-holds-barred challenge from a naive newcomer funded by two unscrupulous billionaire lobbyist brothers.
Title: The Campaign
Actors: Will Ferrell, Zach Galifianakis, Jason Sudeikis, Dylan McDermott
Writer: Chris Henchy (screenplay), Shawn Harwell (screenplay), Adam McKay (story), Chris Henchy (story), Shawn Harwell (story)
